talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Taeryeong Shrine Maid$
This is Taeryeong Shrine, where Lady Hwaran sees to her tasks.
It's the place where the lady of the palace stays, so please do not make any noise.

$Taeryeong Shrine Maid$
This is a place for the maids only.
Soldiers? No... Why would we have soldiers in the palace?

$Taeryeong Shrine Maid$
Why would we need guards in the place where Lady Hwaran resides?

$Taeryeong Shrine Maid$
It is said one's mouth is a doorway to disaster and one's tongue is a knife that can even cut flesh.
Thus we are not permitted to speak freely with outsiders.
